pullrequest.title: Currently, genomedata package only works on Python3. The program should not halt when the command is called from with Python3.

content.raw: Genomedata is still tested and working against Python 2 so you should be able to use that in the meantime. We have not tested signal distribution for Python 3 yet though I will take a look.
content.html: Genomedata is still tested and working against Python 2 so you should be able to use that in the meantime. We have not tested signal distribution for Python 3 yet though I will take a look.
